channel.title: Cities on WanderLand
channel.description: Recent content in Cities on WanderLand

item.description: .top-bg{ background-image: url("/img/cities/beijing/bg-down.png"); background-size: auto; width: 99vw; height: 500px; position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; z-index: -100; } .page { height: 600px; margin-top: 40px; /* background-color: antiquewhite; */ } .intro { display: flex; flex-direction: row; } .intro .cityname { margin-top: 200px; font-size: 100px; } .page1 { display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: stretch; } .page1 .upper{ margin-top: 100px; text-align: center; } .page1 .down { display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-around; } .
